Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near 34th/King Drive
ShortDescription: NB 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 35th, Indiana, 31st and King Drive due to, street blockage near 34th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via  King Drive, 35th, Indiana, 31st and King Drive due to, street blockage near 34th/King Drive.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red LineTrains bypassing Jackson Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running in both directions, but not stopping at Jackson due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running in both directions, but not stopping at Jackson due to police activity.

Bus substitution has been requested between Monroe and Harrison to provide connecting service.

At this this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
